tweets.text:
It's the Super Bowl of earnings week for the degen economy, here are the 1-year performance of the top names reporting this week ranked from best to worst:

1. $DKNG +170%, reports on Thursday https://t.co/v31UHQ0smg

Next Earnings Call - Cliff Notes $DKNG 

Analysts: How does @DraftKings expect to make a profit when so many states are looking at raising taxes and there are talks of increasing federal regulations on the industry?

JR: Yeah. It's a great question. I mean, we are always reevaluating every time we have new tax rates discussed at the state level or regulations come up at the federal level, on how we can further push parlay mix onto our customers. The states are expecting tax revenue, and they are finally realizing that isn’t the reality. So, we must figure out a way to trick shareholders and analysts like yourself into believing that we can actually turn a profit once more and more states try to get to a 51% tax rate like New York. If we can continue to purchase apps like Jackpocket, that might help distract everyone for the time being. That’s why we had @GazipuraMo  start the rumor about the merger of Rush Street. And then, I’m sorry what was the second part of the question? Regulations. So, regulations, yeah, that’s a good question. If we get regulated more, again, we’ll just hope to push more parlay mix and that’s definitely something that we're exploring, because what else can we do? But we don't put hope in the guide.
